org.openintents.tools.simulator.controller.sensor

类 LinearAccelerationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openintents.tools.simulator.controller.sensor.SensorController
      • org.openintents.tools.simulator.controller.sensor.LinearAccelerationController

  • public class LinearAccelerationController
extends SensorController
    LinearAccelerationController keeps the behaviour of the LinearAcceleration sensor (listeners, etc.) gravity + linear acceleration = acceleration (from accelerometer sensor)
    作者:
    ilarele

      • updateSensorPhysics

        public void updateSensorPhysics(OrientationModel orientation,
                                WiiAccelerometerModel realDeviceBridgeAddon,
                                int delay)
        从类复制的说明: SensorController
        Updates model using view data (computes sensor internal variables). It is call on each iteration for sensor updates.
        指定者:
        updateSensorPhysics 在类中 SensorController
